name: meshcentral
description: MeshCentral is a full-featured self-hosted remote support platform that provides remote desktop, terminal, file transfers, and agent-based monitoring across devices with user and group management.
features: Remote desktop: Access and control remote computers through web-based VNC or RDP connections.
Terminal access: Open command-line sessions on remote machines for administration tasks.
File transfer: Upload and download files between local and remote systems through the web interface.
Agent deployment: Install lightweight agents on devices for persistent remote access and monitoring.
Multi-platform support: Manage Windows, Linux, and macOS devices from a single interface.
User management: Create accounts with granular permissions for accessing specific devices or features.
Device grouping: Organize managed devices into groups for easier navigation and bulk operations.
Session recording: Record remote desktop sessions for compliance, training, or security review.
Two-factor authentication: Secure access with TOTP-based 2FA for enhanced security.
Wake-on-LAN: Remotely power on devices that support WoL for off-hours access.
Chat messaging: Communicate with users on remote devices through built-in chat.
Intel AMT support: Manage devices with Intel Active Management Technology for out-of-band access.
